meanings.sent1: The suspendered pants looked stylish on him.
meanings.sent2: He wore suspendered trousers to the party.
meanings.sent3: The suspendered outfit made him feel like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was as strong as a suspendered bridge.
meanings.sent5: The suspendered look added a touch of elegance to his attire.

meanings.definition: Supported or held up by suspenders.
meanings.sent1: The suspendered shelf held his books securely.
meanings.sent2: The suspendered bookcase was a unique piece of furniture.
meanings.sent3: The suspendered bookshelf seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent4: His hopes were as suspendered as the shelf holding his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The suspendered support kept everything in its place.
